snippet: Louisiana State, which absorbed a lopsided loss against Alabama in the Bowl Championship Series national title game last January, was ranked No. 1 in the USA Today top 25 coaches’ poll.
abstract: Louisiana State college football team is ranked No. 1 in the USA Today top 25 coaches’ preseason poll; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Louisiana State, which absorbed a lopsided loss against Alabama in the Bowl Championship Series national title game last January, was ranked No. 1 in the USA Today top 25 coaches’ poll.

headline.main: L.S.U. Gets Top Ranking in Coaches’ Preseason Poll
headline.print_headline: L.S.U. Gets Top Ranking In Coaches’ Preseason Poll
